meanings.definition: Relating to the study of chemical substances within cells.
meanings.sent1: The cytochemical analysis revealed the presence of specific molecules inside the cell.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use cytochemical methods to understand the chemical composition of cells.
meanings.sent3: The cytochemical investigation of the cell's interior was like solving a tiny chemical puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of cytochemical reactions was a key to unlocking the secrets of cellular chemistry.
meanings.sent5: The cytochemical properties of the cell were illuminated under the microscope.

meanings.definition: Involving the use of chemical techniques to analyze cellular components.
meanings.sent1: The cytochemical approach helped identify the different components within the cell.
meanings.sent2: Researchers rely on cytochemical methods to examine the structures of cells.
meanings.sent3: The cytochemical experiment turned the lab into a mini chemistry lab.
meanings.sent4: His cytochemical skills allowed him to dissect the cellular makeup with precision.
meanings.sent5: The cytochemical analysis provided a detailed map of the cell's composition.
